item.title: Why Enviro Infra Engineers Stock Price Is Surging? Shares Up By 15% In 2 Days - News18
item.description:
Why Enviro Infra Engineers Stock Price Is Surging? Shares Up By 15% In 2 Days

Date: December 16, 2024

Source: News18

Enviro Infra Engineers has experienced a significant surge in its stock price, climbing 15% in just two days, following a strong market debut that saw shares listed at a nearly 50% premium over their issue price.

  • Shares rose by 7% on December 16, reaching Rs 318.90.
  • The stock has doubled from its IPO price of Rs 148.
  • Investor confidence is driven by demand for sustainable water infrastructure solutions.
  • The IPO was oversubscribed 89.90 times, indicating strong market interest.
  • Prominent investors like Mukul Agarwal and Sunil Singhania back the company.
“The surge in Enviro Infra Engineers’ stock price can be attributed to growing demand for sustainable water infrastructure solutions,” analysts state.

This surge reflects not just a momentary spike but also a growing optimism about the company's long-term prospects in the sustainable infrastructure sector.

item.title: ‘The Nvidia Way’ review: The hard work of tech mastery | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
‘The Nvidia Way’ review: The hard work of tech mastery

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Company Business News

The origin story of Nvidia is starkly contrasted with other tech legends, revealing a unique journey from humble beginnings to a tech powerhouse. The stock price of Nvidia has seen remarkable growth, indicating its importance and influence in the tech industry.

  • Nvidia started in a San Jose Denny's in 1992 with three founders brainstorming over coffee.
  • The company's stock has increased from around $6 in January 2020 to nearly $140 today.
“Nvidia’s staggering ascent says anything, it is that mythical status is imminent.”

This review highlights the potential legacy of Nvidia's founders and its innovative journey in the tech world.

item.title: MobiKwik IPO allotment status check online: Applied for shares? Got or not? NSE, BSE Link Intime website to track LIVE - ET Now
item.description:
MobiKwik IPO allotment status check online: Applied for shares? Got or not?

Updated: Dec 16, 2024 | Source: ET Now

The MobiKwik IPO has experienced significant interest, achieving a subscription rate of 119.38 times as the offer concluded, with a high level of participation from various investor categories.

  • The initial public offer (IPO) of MobiKwik raised Rs 572 crore.
  • It received bids for over 1.41 billion shares, significantly above the 118.71 million shares on offer.
  • The allotment date is expected on December 16, 2024.
  • Investors can check their allotment status via NSE, BSE, and LinkIntime websites.
  • The company has set a share price band of Rs 265-279.
  • This IPO marks MobiKwik's second attempt after its initial plans in 2021 were shelved.
“On Tuesday, One MobiKwik Systems said it garnered Rs 257 crore from anchor investors.”

MobiKwik's IPO signifies a critical moment for the company, aiming for a successful market entry after overcoming previous hurdles.

item.title: YouTuber slams ‘filthy’ Air India business class flight for ‘miserable’ nine-hour experience - Hindustan Times
item.description:
YouTuber Criticizes Air India's 'Filthy' Business Class Experience

Date: Dec 16, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

A travel influencer, Drew Binsky, criticized Air India for a disastrous business class flight experience that he labeled the worst of his life.

  • Binsky traveled from London to Amritsar, paying $750 for the business class upgrade.
  • He faced issues such as a broken seat, cramped space, and a dirty meal setting.
  • The in-flight entertainment was outdated, and WiFi connectivity was poor.
  • He found the amenities lacking, comparing them to those of a one-star motel.
  • Despite the complaints, Air India has not yet responded to his criticisms.
“Thank you Air India for this miserable nine-hour experience which I spent $750 to upgrade for.”

This incident highlights ongoing concerns about airline service quality, especially in premium offerings, and emphasizes the need for airlines to maintain standards.

item.title: Cheapest Hybrid 7-Seater Spotted? - MotorOctane
item.description:
Cheapest Hybrid 7-Seater Spotted?

Publication Date: December 2024   |   Source: MotorOctane

The automotive industry is gearing up for the Bharat Mobility show, with brands preparing to unveil new models. Recently, spy shots emerged of a new Maruti SUV, suspected to be the Grand Vitara facelift or its 7-seater variant.

  • Maruti's new e-Vitara SUV is also expected to launch shortly.
  • The spy shots indicate a new model featuring a closed grille and other slight changes, but not the e-Vitara due to the placement of the charging point.
  • Industry speculations suggest this could be the Grand Vitara facelift.
  • The new features include split LED headlamps, updated interiors, and possibly a larger 10.25-inch infotainment screen.
“Currently not much of the details of this new Maruti SUV are disclosed. However, as we near the Bharat Mobility Expo, we expect more details to be revealed.”

The new Grand Vitara is anticipated to create a buzz in the upcoming Bharat Mobility Expo with more details expected soon.

item.title: Vishal Mega Mart IPO Allotment Finalised Today: Know Latest GMP, How To Check Allotment Status Online - News18
item.description:
Vishal Mega Mart IPO Allotment Finalised Today: Know Latest GMP, How To Check Allotment Status Online

Last Updated: December 16, 2024, 17:20 IST

The Vishal Mega Mart IPO allotment has been finalised, and investors can expect confirmation via bank debit messages. The IPO has garnered significant interest, with a high subscription rate across categories.

  • The IPO was open for subscription from December 11 to 13 and was oversubscribed 28.75 times.
  • Latest grey market premium (GMP) stands at 24.36%, trading at Rs 97.
  • The allotment notification will be sent out by December 16 evening.
  • Shares will be listed on BSE and NSE on December 18.
“The IPO price band was set at Rs 74 to Rs 78 per share, with considerable interest across all categories.”

The Vishal Mega Mart IPO reflects strong investor confidence, making it a significant event in India's retail market.

item.title: LG Electronics India IPO: Valuation, listing timeline and more – Latest update - ET Now
item.description:
LG Electronics India IPO: Valuation, Listing Timeline and More – Latest Update

Updated: Dec 16, 2024 18:46 IST | Source: ET Now

LG Electronics India is set to increase its valuation and plans to go public in Mumbai in 2025, following a recently filed red herring prospectus.

  • The company aims for a listing in Mumbai in the first half of 2025.
  • A formal roadshow for LG Electronics India Pvt.’s IPO will start within two months.
  • Plans to sell up to 101.82 million shares with no new shares offered.
  • Initial valuation aimed at around $13 billion, possibly increasing to $15 billion based on investor feedback.
  • Leading financial institutions managing the IPO include Morgan Stanley and JPMorgan Chase.
The company could seek to raise between $1 billion and $1.5 billion during the IPO.

This IPO comes amid a strong year for share sales in India, with nearly $18 billion raised via IPOs in 2024, reflecting growing interest from global investors.

item.title: HDFC Bank Q3 results FY2024-25 Date: Private lender to announce quarterly earnings next month - Check schedule - ET Now
item.description:
HDFC Bank to Announce Q3 Results for FY2024-25 Next Month

Date: Updated Dec 16, 2024

Source: ET NOW

HDFC Bank Limited is preparing to disclose its quarterly earnings for the third quarter of the financial year 2024-25. The announcement is anticipated during an upcoming board meeting scheduled for January 22, 2025.

  • HDFC Bank's revenue for the previous quarter was reported at Rs 74,016 crore.
  • The bank holds a market capitalization of Rs 1.42 lakh crore and is a component of the BSE Sensex index.
  • In the last month, HDFC Bank shares have provided a return of 10.14% to investors.
“In the exchange filing, the bank has informed about the upcoming board meeting in January 2025.”

The forthcoming earnings report is crucial for investors as it will outline the bank's financial performance and future outlook amidst varying market conditions.

item.title: Delhi High Court summons SpiceJet CEO, COO over non-payment of $6 million to lessors - Bar & Bench - Indian Legal News
item.description:
Delhi High Court Summons SpiceJet Executives Over $6 Million Payment Issue

Published on: 16 Dec 2024, 11:26 am

The Delhi High Court has summoned the CEO and COO of SpiceJet to appear in court over a non-payment of $6.03 million due to lessors. The court specified that video conferencing was not an option for their appearance.

  • The court directed SpiceJet executives to appear on January 16, 2025.
  • Engine lessors have initiated legal action against SpiceJet for non-payment.
  • SpiceJet defaulted on a prior agreement to pay $4.8 million in installments.
  • The court has ordered SpiceJet to ground three engines and return them to lessors.
"It is made clear that the request of the counsel for Judgement Debtor (SpiceJet) for appearance of the aforesaid officers through Video Conferencing has been specifically denied."

This order emphasizes the seriousness of SpiceJet's financial issues and its obligations to the lessors as it faces multiple legal challenges.

item.title: Market Wrap, December 16: SENSEX, NIFTY end lower on weak global cues; realty stocks dazzle - Upstox
item.description:
Market Wrap, December 16: SENSEX, NIFTY end lower on weak global cues; realty stocks dazzle

Date: December 16

Source: Market News

The domestic equity market ended in the red on December 16, influenced by weak global cues amidst concerns over central bank meetings and economic data.

Key Points

  • The S&P BSE SENSEX closed at 81,748.57, down 384.5 points (0.47%).
  • The NSE's NIFTY50 index finished at 24,668.25, down 100 points (0.4%).
  • A total of 4,240 stocks traded on the BSE; 2,346 advanced while 1,796 declined.
  • Top gainers include Dr Reddy's and IndusInd Bank, while Titan Company and Adani Ports were among the biggest losers.
  • Swiggy's shares rose 11.7% after announcing a significant expansion in its quick commerce business.
  • Most sector indices ended lower except for realty stocks, which saw a 3.17% increase.

Notable Quotes or Statistics

Swiggy plans to double its store count and replace smaller stores with larger ones to enhance its operations.

Conclusion

Despite a rough trading day for most indices, the realty sector showed significant gains, highlighting sector-specific performance amid broader market challenges.

item.title: Gold Rate Today In India: Check 22 Carat Price In Your City On December 16 - News18
item.description:
Gold Rate Today In India: Check 22 Carat Price In Your City On December 16

Last Updated: December 16, 2024, 19:14 IST

As of December 16, gold prices in India remained high. The cost of 24-carat gold was Rs 77,890 per 10 grams, while 22-carat gold was priced at Rs 71,400 per 10 grams.

Key Points:

  • 24-carat gold is priced at Rs 77,890 per 10 grams.
  • 22-carat gold is priced at Rs 71,400 per 10 grams.
  • Silver was trading at Rs 92,500 per kilogram.
  • Gold prices vary across cities, with notable rates in major cities listed.
  • Gold has cultural significance and is often used in celebrations.
"Gold has deep cultural and financial significance in India. It is a preferred investment option and is key in celebrations, particularly during weddings and festivals."

This article provides an overview of gold prices in India for December 16, with emphasis on the rates for both 22 and 24-carat gold in various cities.

item.title: India’s imports rose 27% to hit a record high of $70 billion in November - The Hindu
item.description:
India’s Imports Hit Record High of $70 Billion in November

Date: December 16, 2024 - Source: The Hindu

India's merchandise exports have declined while imports surged, leading to a significant trade deficit.

  • Imports rose 27% to $70 billion, a record high.
  • Exports fell 4.83% to $32.11 billion.
  • The trade deficit reached an all-time high of $37.84 billion.
  • Non-petroleum exports rose by 7.8%, touching $28.4 billion.
  • Petroleum exports dropped about 49% due to falling prices.
“Non-petroleum exports have grown at a comfortable pace and that is what we should be looking at,” - Commerce Secretary Sunil Barthwal.

The growing trend in imports and the significant trade deficit reflect the current economic challenges India is facing.

item.title: India’s imports rise to 27%, touches to record high of almost $70 billion - The Hindu
item.description:
India’s Imports Hit Record High of $70 Billion in November

item.title: Bombay Shaving Company CEO Lashes Out At Zepto, Zomato And Other 10-Min Food Delivery Apps—Heres Why - NDTV Profit
item.description:
Bombay Shaving Company CEO Lashes Out At Zepto, Zomato And Other 10-Min Food Delivery Apps—Here's Why

Publication Date: November 2023 | Source: Unknown

Shantanu Deshpande, CEO of Bombay Shaving Company, criticizes the impact of 10-minute food delivery services on nutrition in India, likening the trend to unhealthy eating habits in China and the U.S.

  • Deshpande speaks about being told meal preparation and delivery times that sum up to ten minutes.
  • He emphasizes the crisis of poor nutrition that Indians face, largely due to unhealthy processed foods.
  • The post highlights competition among food delivery companies like Zomato, Swiggy, and the startup Zepto.
  • He recounts the quality concerns regarding the foods delivered in such a short time frame.
  • Deshpande encourages people to learn cooking as a vital skill.
“You are what you eat.”

In closing, Deshpande underscores the importance of healthy eating habits and self-preparation of meals.
